Title: Permits the city of Saratoga Springs to adopt a resolution requesting further restriction of hours of sale of alcoholic beverages within such city
Summary: Permits the city of Saratoga Springs to adopt a resolution requesting further restriction of hours of sale of alcoholic beverages within such city.
ActClause: AN ACT permitting the city of Saratoga Springs to adopt a resolution requesting further restriction of hours of sale of alcoholic beverages within such city
